title: Colm Gildernew – 2022 Comments on Health in Northern Ireland
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Colm Gildernew, the Sinn Féin spokesman for Health, on 2 August 2022.
content:
After over a decade of cruel cuts and underinvestment in our health service, the Tories are once again demonstrating that they are bad for your health.
